Package chat.client

Class ClientController.GuiSocketThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • chat.client.Client.SocketThread
        • chat.client.ClientController.GuiSocketThread
  • Enclosing class:
    ClientController

    public class ClientController.GuiSocketThread
extends Client.SocketThread
    A thread that handles all requests coming from the server on the client side and is responsible for the first acquaintance of the client and the server

                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
